attributes.additional_details: My friend is 24 and has just got an offer for work. 30 hours per week £720 per month. he gets at the moment rent paid 395per month council tax 60 per month and roughly 254 per month jsa this is 709 per month. this isnt only stupid but its funny why why why would anyone work 30 hours a week for £19.00 per month. I want the government to let anyone in work get tax credits no matter what age.
